knowledge_panel.description: an adventure is an exciting experience or undertaking that is typically bold, sometimes risky. adventures may be activities with some potential for physical danger such as traveling, exploring, skydiving, mountain climbing, scuba diving, river rafting or participating in extreme sports. wikipedia

def_list.definition: an unusual and exciting, typically hazardous, experience or activity.
engage in hazardous and exciting activity, especially the exploration of unknown territory.
